home.subtitle: Where AI meets craftsmanship. We build tools that make machines think and developers smile.
home.disclaimer: (The machines haven't taken over yet. We're keeping an eye on them.)

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.subtitle: Tools we've set loose on the world.

hu.desc: Developer workflow CLI that extends Claude Code with custom commands. Your terminal, supercharged.

claudeBrowse.desc: Headless browser automation via Playwright for Claude Code. Let the AI do the browsing.

tensors.desc: CLI for managing safetensor model weights and browsing CivitAI. Taming tensors, one file at a time.

assistants.title: AI Assistant Frameworks
assistants.desc: Persistent memory systems and Claude Code plugins. Because even AI deserves a long-term memory.

imageGen.title: Image Generation Tools
imageGen.desc: Desktop apps and CLIs for Stable Diffusion and friends. Pixels on demand.

agents.title: ACP Agents
agents.desc: Lightweight agents for the Agent Client Protocol. Connecting AI to any editor that speaks the language.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance
acceptance.text: By accessing this website, you agree to these terms. If you disagree, please do not use our services.

use.title: 2. Use of Service
use.text: You agree to use our services lawfully and not for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not violate any laws in your jurisdiction.

ip.title: 3. Intellectual Property
ip.text: All content, trademarks, and materials on this site are owned by SAIDEN. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without written permission.

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, SAIDEN shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

law.title: 6. Governing Law
law.text: These terms are governed by the laws of Poland and the European Union. For US users, disputes shall be resolved under the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.text: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

activity.title: What We Do
activity.description: Software development, IT consulting, and infrastructure management.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.text: SAIDEN respects your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data in compliance with GDPR (EU) and CCPA (California).

collect.title: 2. Data We Collect
collect.item1: Contact info (name, email) when you reach out
collect.item3: Usage data (pages visited, time on site)

legal.title: 4. Legal Basis (GDPR)
legal.text: We process data based on: consent, contract performance, legal obligations, or legitimate interests that don't override your rights.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.euText: Access, rectify, erase, restrict, port, or object to your data processing. Withdraw consent anytime.
rights.usText: Know what data we collect, request deletion, opt-out of sale (we don't sell data), and non-discrimination for exercising rights.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.text: We use essential cookies for site functionality. You can manage preferences in your browser settings.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.text: We keep data only as long as necessary for the purposes collected, then securely delete it.

security.title: 8. Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.

transfers.title: 9. International Transfers
transfers.text: If we transfer data outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses).

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.complaint: You may also lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
